#summary List of useful open-source projects for easier Django development on App Engine.
#labels Featured

Most of these projects require app-engine-patch:

 * [http://github.com/tallstreet/jaikuenginepatch/tree/master Jaiku ported to app-engine-patch]
 * [http://aralbalkan.com/1784 Gaebar]: Backup and restore utility for datastore
 * [http://www.rafaljonca.org/projects/ Rafał Jońca's blog]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/ihere-blog/ ihere]: Another blog
 * [http://www.bitbucket.org/jeverling/django-registration_appenginepatch/ django-registration]: user registration support
 * [http://github.com/darwin/firepython/tree/master FirePython]: log directly to Firebug
 * [http://bitbucket.org/gumptioncom/gaegene/ Gaegene]: Useful snippets
 * [http://code.google.com/p/google-app-engine-django-openid/ OpenID]: support for OpenID
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gae-django-dbtemplates/ gae-django-dbtemplates]: render templates from the datastore
